title: DSML Kazakhstan
subtitle: Data Science & Machine Learning Community
communityDescription: Join our thriving community of data scientists, ML engineers, and AI enthusiasts across Kazakhstan
discussionHubDescription: Main community chat for discussions, networking, and knowledge sharing
newsFeedDescription: Latest updates, events, and industry news
dataJobsDescription: Data Science and Machine Learning job opportunities
itJobsDescription: General IT and tech job opportunities
communityFirstDesc: We prioritize building strong relationships and supporting each other's growth
continuousLearningDesc: We believe in lifelong learning and sharing knowledge with the community
careerGrowthDesc: We help members advance their careers through mentorship and opportunities
collaborationSubtitle: Discover how we can help your business grow with our expertise and community reach

mediaSupport.title: Media Support & Advertising
mediaSupport.details: We have a network of Telegram channels, LinkedIn, and YouTube with more than 10K unique loyal users that we have been leading since 2017. Our audience consists of highly engaged data scientists, ML engineers, and AI enthusiasts across Kazakhstan and Central Asia.

hiring.title: Hiring & Interviews
hiring.description: Find top-tier AI/ML specialists and managers
hiring.details: We help with hiring top-tier specialists and managers in AI and ML since 2017. Among our community residents are many hiring managers with extensive experience in building successful ML and AI teams. We can connect you with the right talent and provide interview support.

corporateTraining.title: Corporate AI Training
corporateTraining.description: Custom AI courses and competitions for your team
corporateTraining.details: The community has accumulated unique expertise in organizing AI competitions (for example, we conducted the first AI Republican Olympiad in Kazakhstan and participated in training the main team of the country). This can help strengthen your HR brand in the region and even prototype solutions to real company problems with the help of participants. The founder of the Community ranked 14th in the world on kaggle.com and has unique experience in both solving and creating such competitions.

consulting.title: Investment Consulting
consulting.details: Our experienced community members provide consulting on evaluating the prospects of various businesses at an early stage for investments. We leverage our deep technical expertise and market knowledge to help investors make informed decisions in the AI/ML space.
